person.persName: Martin Hardin Bailey (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer and brick maker )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and brick maker. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Richard H. Bailey and Leatitia S. Bailey. Married to Sarah A. Bailey. Father of Radford N. Bailey, William R. Bailey, and Queen E. Bailey. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Brick maker in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Hopkins County in 1860.
